name: Finding Teddy 2 Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
This is the official soundtrack for Finding Teddy 2.

Tracklist


  • 1 - Morning
  • 2 - Home
  • 3 - Cemetery
  • 4 - Garden
  • 5 - Books
  • 6 - Forest
  • 7 - Cave
  • 8 - Water palace
  • 9 - Before battle
  • 10 - Battle
  • 11 - Swamp
  • 12 - Earth palace
  • 13 - Snow
  • 14 - Ice palace
  • 15 - Valley of monsters
  • 16 - Lava cave
  • 17 - Dark palace
  • 18 - Egg room
  • 19 - Get egg
  • 20 - Anguis battle
  • 21 - Last battle
  • 22 - Return
  • 23 - Shop


The Soundtrack will be placed in your Finding Teddy 2 folder in the Steam Directory: …Steam\SteamApps\common\Finding Teddy 2[/i]
